text: Erding () is a town in Bavaria, Germany, and capital of the district Erding. It had a population of 36,469 in 2019. The original Erdinger Weissbier is a well-known Bavarian specialty. Erding is around 31 kilometers northeast of central Munich, about a 30-minute drive by car. Regular S-Bahn trains connect to Munich and beyond. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Erding (district)
title: Erding
